titleInfo.title: (PC) Lucio v. Smith et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER Granting Leave To Amend And Vacating Hearing (Doc. 75), signed by District Judge William Haskell Alsup on 08/20/2012. For the reasons stated, Lucio is GRANTED leave to file his proposed amended complaint. This is without prejudice to new defendants filing a fresh motion to dismiss based on statute of limitations. The hearing scheduled for August 23 is VACATED. Amended Complaint due by 9/24/2012. (Fahrney, E)
